settings.title: Column
settings.text: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

Through the creation of well-designed, functional and Philippine-inspired plant leather goods, Jacinto & Lirio aims to improve the lives of people from both ends of the spectrum—the water hyacinth communities who are empowered through meaningful work, and the people purchasing who are enriched by the eco-friendly products. We aim to work within a collaborative business model for the purpose stated in the mission-- social impact in livelihood, environmental protection and product innovation.

settings.title: Stylish
settings.text: Our beautifully handcrafted plant leather goods are impressively multi-functional and stylish conversational pieces with a lifestyle appeal for professionals.

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.text: Eco-friendly craftsmanship at its finest. We transform the water hyacinth plant, considered a "pest" to society, into a product of value with good quality.

settings.title: Empowering
settings.text: We are focused on providing livelihood to our partnered communities that are affected by the water hyacinth infestation problem in Laguna and Rizal.

custom_css: h2 {font-family: "luna itc"; font-size: 55px; margin: 0 auto; color: #6b501b;}

settings.text: We offer high quality corporate giveaways with a touch of social and environmental responsibility with Water hyacinth.

custom_css: h2 {font-family: "luna itc"; font-size: 40px; color: #6b501b; border-bottom: solid 1px;}

settings.title: Product
settings.text: Choose from our extensive line of water hyacinth vegan leathergoods which can be customized into different kinds of products from bags, wallets, travel accessories, hotel in room accessories, restaurant accessories, media kits, PR Kits, new hire kits, real estate turn over kit and more!

settings.title: Personalization
settings.text: We have no minimum order quantity for personalization using laser engraving or colored printing. MOQ applies for other personalization finishes like embroidery, glitter, hologram, vinyl etc.

settings.title: Packaging
settings.text: We stylize your packaging with packaging options like box made from water hyacinth, wood, card board, acrylic and whatever material suits your theme and budget. This is accented with ribbons, gift cards, paper fillers and other accents upon request.

settings.title: Delivery
settings.text: We do last mile delivery to ALL your recipients nationwide and worldwide. Meaning we can send send swag to one location or to thousands of locations for you so that you can sit back and relax.

custom_css: h2 {font-family: "luna itc"; font-size: 55px; color: #6b501b; margin: 0 auto;}

settings.text: Pre-wedding, wedding proper, gifts for guests, gift bundles in personalized boxes and name & wedding logo personalization.

settings.heading: Do you want to be a RESELLER?

settings.text: The Sales Engagement and Economic Development (SEED) is a reseller program that engages nationwide and international sales through reselling

settings.title: Review Our Products in Amazon
settings.text:
Are you an Amazon shopper?If yes, we need your help! If you've purchased any J&L product before from any of our sales channels, please help us share Filipino craftsmanship to the world by ADDING A REVIEW IN OUR AMAZON STORE.

1. Click the product in our Amazon store.
2. Select the J&L product you bought.
3. Click Write a customer review.
4. Select star rating and/or add text, photo, and video.
5. Click submit.

settings.title: Join our Employee Perks Program
settings.text: Add exclusive perks for your employees with Jacinto & Lirio. Email us at stories@jacintoandlirio.com to discuss the details.

settings.title: FREE printables
settings.text: We officially launch “The Sketchbook”, a series where we will be releasing a free set of printables designed by our very own! Use these printables to spice up things with your own Jacinto & Lirio’s journal or planner and unleash the creativity within you!

settings.question: How do I order online?
settings.answer:
1. Go to www.jacintoandlirio.com, browse through our items under the "shop" tab or "shop by instagram" option at the bottom of the home page or under the shop tab.
  2. Click on the photos of the items, choose a color and variations of the items you would like to purchase, then click "Add to Cart"
  3. Not yet done? Got your eye on another item? Go back to the shop menu, or use the search bar to add more items to your cart.
  4. When you are ready to complete your order, click "Checkout".
  5. Fill in fields with your contact and shipping information.
  6. Choose your payment option (PayPal, BPI or BDO bank deposit).
  7. Double check all the details of your order then click "Complete my purchase".
  8. Once your payment has been settled,  you will receive a confirmation email containing details of your order.

settings.question: Do I need to set up an account to be able to place an order?
settings.answer: Not necessarily, but you know what's the best thing about signing up for an account? The next time you order will be absolutely STRESS-FREE! No more typing in your full address and details every time you shop. Setting up an account is easy and takes 5 seconds––promise, you won't regret it

settings.question: How long is your order processing?
settings.answer:
In order to make sure that your orders are in good quality condition, please give us 1-2 business days to prepare orders with ready stocks and no personalization. For orders with name engraving, lead time is 203 weeks depending on our line up and your order quantity. 

Once it has been forwarded to the courier, the tracking number will be sent in your email.

settings.question: Does Jacinto & Lirio accept international orders?
settings.answer:
Definitely! :) We welcome global environmentalists. We are still fixing our website for international pricing. For the meantime, message us at shoponline@jacintoandlirio.com for inquiries.

Jacinto & Lirio is not responsible if the package is undeliverable because of missing, incomplete or incorrect destination information. Kindly provide the correct shipping details when checking out. In case of wrong information given, kindly email us at shoponline@yahoo.com as soon as possible. However orders shipped or picked up by the courier already is out of our control.

Jacinto & Lirio is not responsible for destination country tax and/or any duty charge that may incur. Customers will be held accountable for any restrictions, duties, taxes and any other fee collected from destination country.

In the case of refusal to accept package by customer or after number of attempts made in the country destination to deliver the package, Jacinto & Lirio reserves its right to abandon the package(s) and will not be responsible for any refund.

We also have a US partner where you can directly purchase for US based shipping addresses. Visit Maiden Maya

settings.question: How do I change or remove items from my shopping cart?
settings.answer: Click the shopping cart on the upper right hand corner of your screen. You will see summary of the items inside your cart. Change the quantity and remove the items as needed.
